action.name: Lance
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit (with disadvantage against a target within 5 ft.), reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d12 + 2}) piercing damage, or 11 ({@damage 1d12 + 5}) piercing damage while mounted.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: {@hit 4} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Feather Fall
entries: The rider wears a magic ring with which it can cast the {@spell feather fall} spell on itself once as a reaction to falling. After the spell is cast, the ring becomes nonmagical.
